title: Episode 59 - Speaker McCarthy
description: Smug reports live from Miami as the fellas give the minions free money with their Kentucky Derby picks and play King of the Hill before welcoming House GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Comfortably Smug, Kevin McCarthy, Josh Holmes, Michael Duncan)
